no-internet-connection.title: Can't Reach the Internet
no-internet-connection.body: Your internet connection has become unavailable. Please reestablish an internet connection and tap the Reload button.

welcome.description: A secure cryptocurrency made for your world

phone-number.title: Enter Phone Number
phone-number.heading: Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number
phone-number.phoneCorrect: Is your phone number above correct?
phone-number.errorInvitation: Use of UR Money is currently available by invitation only, and your phone number was not on the invitee list.
phone-number.errorSms: There was an unexpected problem sending the SMS. Please try again later

verification-sms-code.title: Verification code
verification-sms-code.heading1: We have sent you an SMS with a code.
verification-sms-code.heading2: To complete your phone number verification, please enter the 6-digit activation code.
verification-sms-code.errorVerificationSms: We were unable to process your verification code. Please try again later
verification-sms-code.errorCode: The verification code you entered is incorrect or expired. Please try again.
verification-sms-code.errorSendingSmsAgain: There was an unexpected problem sending the SMS. Please try again later

intro.title: Set Up Profile
intro.notReadyMessage: Since identity verification is required for the use of the UR Money app, you will need to sign out for now. Are you sure you want to sign out?

wallet-setup.title: Secret Phrase Setup
wallet-setup.confirmWrittenDownMessage2: Write this phrase on a piece of paper and store it in a safe place.
wallet-setup.confirmWrittenDownMessage3: WARNING: UR Technology does not store your secret phrase and will NOT be able to recover it if it is lost or forgotten.
wallet-setup.reenterSecretPhraseMessage: Please confirm your secret phrase by re-entering it.
wallet-setup.youWillReceiveBonus: You will receive your 2,000 UR bonus soon!

verification-pending.title: Verification pending
verification-pending.message: Thank you for submitting your verification request. Most requests are processed within 24 hours. We will notify you via text message when we are finished processing your request.

verification-failed.title: Verification Failed
verification-failed.message: We're sorry. We were unable to verify your identity. We will send you an email with details on how you can re-apply.

country-not-supported.title: UR Money
country-not-supported.message: Thank you for your interest in UR money. When we launch in your country, we will notify you.

app.inviteMessage: Invite your loved ones and get

contacts.inviteMessage: I downloaded the UR money app and got 2,000 units of cryptocurrency for free. To learn more and get yours free too, visit
contacts.toastMessage: Pick an app and type a message. Or you can paste the simple message that we've placed in your clipboard.
contacts.messageNoContacts: It looks like you don't have contacts yet. Invite a friend
contacts.messageContactNotPresent: Contact not in list? Invite a friend
contacts.contacts.sorryInvitesDisabled: Sorry, invites are disabled for this account.

chat.blockMessage: Block {{value}}? Blocked contacts will no longer be able to send you messages.

send.title: Send UR
send.incorrectSecretPhrase: The secret phrase you entered was not correct.
send.numberOutOfRange: Amount must be between 0 and max amount.

about.heading: About UR
about.urCurrency: UR is an advanced cryptocurrency made for everyday people and everyday expenditures. 2,000 UR is distributed to every human being who chooses to join the UR community and proves his or her identity. There is no cost to join or to receive this distribution. UR community members may earn additional UR by referring other members and for helping to support the integrity, security, and usefulness of UR currency and the UR community.
about.urTechnologyInc: UR Technology Inc. is a company whose mission is to create a secure, stable, and useful world currency available to every human being.
about.feedbackPart1: To send us feedback on on the UR Money app (bugs, feature requests, etc.), please join our slack team by visiting
about.feedbackPart2: and send us a message in the #ur-money-feedback channel, or send us an email at
about.abuse: To report abuse by other members, please send us an email at
about.learnMore: To learn more about UR, and UR Technology visit us at

noInternetConnection: No internet connection available. Please try again later.
unexpectedErrorMessage: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.
